mapper.insert: insert into orderlist(orderNum, totPrice, spPrice, cuNum, username, destination, orderDate, orderStatem, orderMessage, orderName) values(#{orderNum}, #{totPrice}, #{spPrice}, #{cuNum}, #{username}, #{destination}, sysdata(), 1, #{orderMessage}, #{orderName})
mapper.select: select * from orderlist where username=#{username} and orderNum=#{orderNum}
